name: Archivos puntos
body:
# INFORMATION
This is the record and tweaks of into my dotfiles like .bashrc .zshrc and 
others spesific or less accecible files like issue

Is possible that I add others specials (or not) files or _REALLY_ tweaked configs

## Home/User
I change my shell only for testing or borring, actually I try to maintain
in my dotfiles all toce rc files for those shell.
actually I have this rc for tose shells, adding minors or major changes
compared to a vanilla/default config: 

* Bash
* Zsh
* MKsh
* TCsh
* PDKsh

## Etc/*
Configuration files for my Samsunng N100C-N01CL with Poulsbo graphics, Compac CQ10 with a i686 capable only processor

## Poni
Er...IMGS for [ponysay](http://github.com/erkin/ponysay) that i make, 
the G1 (not all but for now all G1 here), Swaped gender and Moonstuck are non official and you are safe to use in any project, all other included Sweetcream (Sweetcream Scoops) and other are property of they respective authors and I only create the image, free to use only if you give the correct copyright to they (as any art in deviantART make) and source to here.

All **MY** Original Character are under the 'GNU Public License Version 2 only'.

bye
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
